snippet: The immolations are a fresh illustration of growing turmoil among ethnic Tibetans in Sichuan Province fighting what they see as repression at the hands of the Chinese authorities.
lead_paragraph: The immolations are a fresh illustration of growing turmoil among ethnic Tibetans in Sichuan Province fighting what they see as repression at the hands of the Chinese authorities.

headline.main: Three Tibetan Herders Self-Immolate in Protest
headline.print_headline: Three Tibetan Herders Self-Immolate in Protest
